readability_reflection: String concatenation was a lot more readable. Also, string concatenation is an approach I have been using since I was a freshmen so it is more familiar. I was confused in some of the instances for string interpolation.
comprehension_debugging: I felt that I was able to solve the string concatenation tasks faster. But the for the final tasks string interpolation was a better approach.
preference_rationale: It depends. If I were to use variables to store commonly used labels I would use string interpolation. Other wise I would use string concatenation if I had to use uncommonly used terms.
learning_curve: String concatenation is an approach I have been using since I was a freshmen so it is more familiar. I was confused in some of the instances for string interpolation.
